isRoot

public static boolean isRoot(GrailsDomainClass grailsDomainClass, java.util.Collection searchableGrailsDomainClasses)
Is the given GrailsDomainClass a root class in the Compass mapping?
param:
grailsDomainClass the domain class to check for
param:
searchableGrailsDomainClasses a collection of searchable GrailsDomainClass instances
return:
true unless it's an embedded class in another domain class without explicit searchable declaration
